body:
Or -pkgdir

On 1 July 2016 at 11:18, Dave Cheney <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Please don't do that, use go build when cross compiling instead.
>
> On Fri, 1 Jul 2016, 09:16 John Zila <notifications@github.com> wrote:
>
> > FYI this problem can be solved by setting the permissions on your GOROOT
> > package directory.
> > ls $(go env GOROOT)/pkg && sudo chown -R $USER $(go env GOROOT)/pkg
> >
> > —
> > You are receiving this because you commented.
> > Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> > <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/14213#issuecomment-229815144>, or
> mute
